author: daxian-dbw
body:
Resolving 4 issues:
- [x] Make `Start-PSPackage` support creating zip package
- [x] Make `Start-PSPackage` support creating down level packages for win-platform
- [x] Fix the version issue when creating msi and appx packages
- [x] Fix the package file name when creating msi and appx packages
